content.title: View the Responsiveness of the Screens
content.body:
1. Click the add (+) icon to add a recipient.
    Drag and resize the form canvas to see the change in the layout of the form.
    Alternatively, from the top of the Iris Preview window, use the dimensions specifier to change the dimensions and see the change in layout.
  2. Select a recipient from the list to view their details.
  3. From the details page, click the Delete button to delete the recipient.
  4. From the details page, click the Edit button to edit the recipient details.
    Drag and resize the form canvas to see the change in the layout of the form.
    Alternatively, from the top of the Iris Preview window, use the dimensions specifier to change the dimensions and see the change in layout.
  5. Click the logout button on top of the screen to navigate to the login screen.
